issue.title: ISO code reversed
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

"ISO 639-2 Terminology" and "ISO 639-1" definitions are inverted.
Such configurations implies wrong metadata XML render.

_sdi_sys_isolanguage content must be fixed through installers (INSTALL and UPDATE) like this:
@1 	1 	1 	iso639-1
2 	2 	1 	iso639-2B
3 	3 	1 	iso639-2T@

instead of:
@1 	1 	1 	iso639-2T
2 	2 	1 	iso639-2B
3 	3 	1 	iso639-1@

**Fixed versions :** 4.1.0
